src:
414 Pemanah Dipastikan Ikut Kejurnas Panahan Terbuka di Banda Aceh
01 Nov 2019, 21:41 by Syahril Ahmad


414 Pemanah Dipastikan Ikut Kejurnas Panahan Terbuka di Banda Aceh

KBRN,  Sebanyak 414 pemanah utusan 45 klub dipastikan akan ambil bagian pada kejuaraan nasional (Kejurnas) panahan terbuka antar klub yang akan berlangsung 2 hingga 8 Nopember 2019 di Lapangan Tugu Unsyiah, Darussalam, Banda Aceh.
Ketua Umum Pengurus Provinsi (Pengprov) Perpani Aceh, Dr Nyak Amir MPd kepada wartawan di Banda Aceh, Jumat (1/11/2019) menjelaskan, 414 pemanah dari 45 klub yang sudah mendaftar di panitia, diantaranya 150 berasal dari Aceh dan sejumlah provinsi lain di tanah air.
“Mereka tersebut berasal dari 20 klub di Aceh dan selebihnya 264 atlet mewakili klub dari Sumatera Utara, Bengkulu, Lampung, Riau, Sumatera Utara, Sumatera Selatan, Jawa Timur, Jawa Tengah, DKI Jakarta, Bali, Jawa Barat dan Kalimantan Timur,”ujarnya.
Disebutkannya, sebanyak delapan atlet Aceh yang telah lolos PON XX /2020 di Papua juga dipastikan akan ambil bagian pada event nasional ini. Ramainya pemanah Aceh yang  mewakili klub masing-masing, sehingga besar peluang Aceh mengumpulkan 16 medali emas.
“ Kejurnas panahan ini, memperlombakan nomor divisi nasional standar bow, FITA recurve, compound dan divisi barebow perorangan dan beregu putra-putri memperebutkan 32 medali emas, 32 perak dan 32 medali perunggu serta uang tunai dengan total Rp 50 juta.
Nyak Amir optimis, Aceh yang turun berbagai klub di kabupaten/kota bisa mengumpulkan banyak medali. “Para  atlet yang bakal tampil di event nasional ini dari berbagai provinsi di tanah air, bakal menjadi saingan berat bagi atlet Aceh untuk meraih medali sebanyak-banyaknya,”katanya.
Ia menambahkan, Kejurnas panahan terbuka antar klub yang kedua digelar Pengprov Perpani Aceh, setelah sukses yang pertama pada 2017, persiapan panitia sudah maksimal dan direncanakan akan dibuka Plt Gubernur Aceh, Ir. Nova Iriansyah MT.
text:
414 Archers Confirmed to Join Open Archery Championship in Banda Aceh
Nov 01 2019, 21:41 by Syahril Ahmad


414 Archers Confirmed to Join Open Archery Championship in Banda Aceh

KBRN, a total of 414 archers delegated 45 clubs will certainly take part in the national championship (National Championship) of open archery between clubs which will take place from 2 to 8 November 2019 at the Tugu Unsyiah Square, Darussalam, Banda Aceh.
Chairman of the Aceh Perpani Provincial Management (Pengprov), Dr. Nyak Amir MPd told reporters in Banda Aceh, Friday (1/11/2019) explained, 414 archers from 45 clubs that had registered in the committee, of which 150 were from Aceh and a number of other provinces in the motherland.
"They come from 20 clubs in Aceh and the remaining 264 athletes represent clubs from North Sumatra, Bengkulu, Lampung, Riau, North Sumatra, South Sumatra, East Java, Central Java, DKI Jakarta, Bali, West Java and East Kalimantan," he said .
He stated, as many as eight Aceh athletes who had passed PON XX / 2020 in Papua were also certain to take part in this national event. The crowd of Aceh archers representing their respective clubs, so that Aceh has a great opportunity to collect 16 gold medals.
"This archery National Championship competes in the national bow standard division number, FITA recurve, compound and individual barebow division and the men's and women's team competes for 32 gold medals, 32 silver medals and 32 bronze medals and cash totaling Rp 50 million.
Nyak Amir is optimistic that Aceh, which is involved in various clubs in the regency / city, can collect many medals. "The athletes who will appear at this national event from various provinces in the country, will be a tough rival for Aceh athletes to win as many medals as possible," he said.
He added, the National Open Archery Championship between the two clubs was held by the Aceh Perpani Pengprov, after the first success in 2017, the committee's preparations were maximized and planned to be opened by the Acting Governor of Aceh, Ir. Nova Iriansyah MT.
